CustomField.formula: IF(FLOOR( MOD( (CallAcceptDateTime - CallQueuedDateTime)* 24, 24 ) ) > 0, TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (CallAcceptDateTime - CallQueuedDateTime)* 24, 24 ) ) ) & ":","00:") & IF(FLOOR( MOD( (CallAcceptDateTime - CallQueuedDateTime)* 24 * 60, 60 ) ) > 0, LPAD( TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (CallAcceptDateTime - CallQueuedDateTime)* 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ), 2, "0") & ":","00:") & IF(FLOOR( MOD( (CallAcceptDateTime - CallQueuedDateTime)* 24 * 60 * 60, 60 ) ) > 0, LPAD( TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (CallAcceptDateTime - CallQueuedDateTime)* 24 * 60 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ), 2, "0"), "00")
CustomField.label: Call Waiting In Queue Duration
